hero.title: Hello! I am
hero.description: Systems Engineer with over 6 years of experience as a fullstack developer and digital consultant. I specialize in creating web platforms, robust APIs and automated solutions that allow businesses and startups to scale their operations, reduce costs and provide a better experience to their users. I work with entrepreneurs, companies and organizations in Peru, Chile and other Spanish-speaking countries.
